The region of the selected workspace. The default value will use the Region selection above.

properties.displayName: ASIM Authentication parser for CrowdStrike Falcon Endpoint Protection
properties.query:
let EventSeverityLookup = datatable (LogSeverity: string, EventSeverity: string)
  [
    "0", "Informational",
    "1", "Informational",
    "2", "Low",
    "3", "Medium",
    "4", "High",
    "5", "High"
];
let parser = (disabled: bool=false) {
  CommonSecurityLog
  | where not(disabled)
  | where DeviceEventCategory == "AuthActivityAuditEvent" and (DeviceVendor == "CrowdStrike" and DeviceProduct == "FalconHost")
  | where DeviceEventClassID in ("userAuthenticate", "twoFactorAuthenticate")
  | lookup EventSeverityLookup on LogSeverity
  | extend
      EventResult = iff(EventOutcome == "true", "Success", "Failure"),
      EventStartTime = todatetime(DeviceCustomDate1),
      EventCount = int(1),
      EventSchema = "Authentication",
      EventSchemaVersion = "0.1.3",
      EventType = "Logon",
      EventProduct = "FalconHost",
      EventVendor = "CrowdStrike",
      Type = "CommonSecurityLog"
  | project-rename
      TargetIpAddr = DestinationTranslatedAddress,
      EventUid = _ItemId,
      EventOriginalSeverity = LogSeverity,
      EventOriginalSubType = DeviceEventClassID,
      EventOriginalType = DeviceEventCategory,
      EventProductVersion = DeviceVersion,
      EventOriginalResultDetails = EventOutcome,
      TargetUsername = DestinationUserName,
      TargetAppName = ProcessName
  | extend
      EventEndTime = EventStartTime,
      DvcIpAddr = TargetIpAddr,
      TargetUsernameType = _ASIM_GetUsernameType(TargetUsername),
      TargetUserType = _ASIM_GetUserType(TargetUsername, ""),
      TargetAppType = iff(isnotempty(TargetAppName), "Service", ""),
      LogonMethod = iff(EventOriginalSubType =~ "userAuthenticate", "Username & Password", "Multi factor authentication")
  | extend
      User = TargetUsername,
      Dst = TargetIpAddr,
      Dvc = coalesce(DvcIpAddr, EventProduct),
      Application = TargetAppName
  | project
      TimeGenerated,
      EventResult,
      EventStartTime,
      EventCount,
      EventSchema,
      EventSchemaVersion,
      EventType,
      EventProduct,
      EventVendor,
      Type,
      TargetIpAddr,
      EventUid,
      EventOriginalSeverity,
      EventOriginalSubType,
      EventOriginalType,
      EventProductVersion,
      EventOriginalResultDetails,
      TargetUsername,
      TargetAppName,
      EventEndTime,
      DvcIpAddr,
      TargetUsernameType,
      TargetUserType,
      TargetAppType,
      LogonMethod,
      User,
      Dst,
      Dvc,
      Application
};
parser(disabled=disabled)
